text: ` ` This person is an icon and an absolute badass that I could never even hope to be exactly like,'' said the actress. Fox Searchlight on Saturday night rolled out the green carpet for a tennis - themed Battle of the Sexes premiere with stars Steve Carell and Emma Stone. Also in attendance was the real Billie Jean King, who is played by Stone in the film. ` ` Emma, thanks for making me look so good,'' King quipped about Stone when introducing the film, which follows her life as both a professional tennis player and a pioneer for equality for women.
